title: Amanda Holden slips into sparkly jumpsuit as she supports Jamie Theakston
text:
Amanda Holden is known for her bold fashion choices (Picture: BACKGRID)

Amanda Holden has shown her support for Heart Radio co-host Jamie Theakston after his charity bike ride by wearing – what else?! – a sparkly silver catsuit.

Come on, it’s Amanda – why does daywear have to be boring?

The Britain’s Got Talent judge was spotted in the glittering number in central London today, as Jamie finished up the 650-mile challenge.

Bringing the 70s back, Amanda, 48, was all smiles as she greeted Jamie, who’s raising money for Heart’s charity Global’s Make Some Noise.

Amanda recently spoke of her bold fashion choices, telling The Mirror: ‘When [my mum] was 48 she wouldn’t have dared wear a mini skirt, because she’s of the era where you wouldn’t dare get your knees out if you were nearly 50.

Amanda and her equally sparkling colleague: twinning (Picture: BACKGRID)

‘Whereas I look at Kylie and J-Lo and think, well if she’s still doing it, I’m still doing it.’

Advertisement

Advertisement

Amanda’s tight-fitting outfit choice follows her win for Rear of the Year back in August, beating out the likes of Holly Willoughby and Rachel Riley.

Amanda embraced Jamie after he successfully completed the bike ride (Picture: BACKGRID)

Rear of the Year organiser Tony Edwards commented: ‘She has a particularly shapely, well-toned and, above all, proportionate and understated rear – in contrast to the somewhat exaggerated, fake, cosmetic look for bottoms, recently imported from the USA.’

Amanda joined Jamie on Heart Radio earlier this year, replacing Spice Girl Emma Bunton.

Amanda steps out to show her support looking unsurprisingly amazing (Picture: BACKGRID)

Her two-year deal is reportedly worth £3 million, making her the country’s highest-paid female radio host.

Tune into Heart Breakfast with Jamie Theakston and Amanda Holden, weekdays from 6:30am-10am.
